title: Dressing Vanities, Granite Countertops, Washer/Dryer In Unit
posting_body: Whether you’re in LA or DTLA, the 1 and 2 bedroom apartments at Broadway Palace Apartments offer exceptional views inside and out.
These apartments provide skyline city views  accompanied by beautifully lush landscaped courtyards.

Whether you want to spend your time relaxing by the pool, having a glass of wine on your private patio, recuperating with some TLC in the calming steam room, or singing to your heart’s content in the Karaoke Party Lounge, the Broadway Palace Apartments will become not only your home but your own private resort.
These luxurious one and two bedroom apartments are available in both LA and Downtown LA.
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
